dt: {bc}the repetition of a sound caused by reflection of sound waves
{bc}one who closely imitates or repeats another's words, ideas, or acts
{bc}a soft repetition of a musical phrase
{bc}the repetition of a received radio signal due especially to reflection of part of the wave from an ionized layer of the atmosphere
{bc}the reflection of transmitted radar signals by an object
{bc}the visual indication of this reflection on a radarscope

et: Middle English {it}ecco{/it}, from Middle French & Latin; Middle French {it}echo{/it}, from Latin, from Greek {it}ēchō{/it}; akin to Latin {it}vagire{/it} to wail, Greek {it}ēchē{/it} sound
shortdef: the repetition of a sound caused by reflection of sound waves
the sound due to such reflection
a repetition or imitation of another : reflection
